name: unrevolutionary
content:
unrevolutionary adjective
(IN POLITICS/HISTORY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
not involved in, typical of, or related to a political revolution (= a major change in the way a country is governed, often using violence): He was eventually denounced for unrevolutionary behaviour.
More examplesFewer examplesHe highlighted those historians who only applied their analysis to unrevolutionary periods. The new administration seemed focused on distinctly unrevolutionary activities such as an attempt to boost the tourist industry.
unrevolutionary adjective
(NOT IMPORTANT)
not completely new or having a great effect: It's a fun but unrevolutionary game.
More examplesFewer examplesWhat I see is an often original but unrevolutionary painter.
